thread.title: Americans Say Marijuana Is Less of Health Risk Than Tobacco, Poll Finds

author: Joshua Jamerson
title: Americans Say Marijuana Is Less of Health Risk Than Tobacco, Poll Finds
text:
Americans are polarized on many issues, but they tend to be on the same page when it comes to assessing the health risks from marijuana, compared with alcoholic beverages, tobacco or sugar.
Far more people say a cigarette, an alcoholic drink or a candy bar are more harmful to a personâ€™s overall health than pot, a new Wall Street Journal/NBC News survey finds.
